name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with over 10 years of experience in backend development and system architecture, specializing in technologies such as **PHP**, **Symfony**, **Node.js**, **.NET**, **Spring Boot**, and cloud platforms including **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**. Proficient in implementing **CI/CD** pipelines using **GitHub Actions** and managing infrastructure through **Terraform** and **Infrastructure as Code** strategies. Expert in software modernization patterns, data migration, and agile methodologies like **Scrum**. Demonstrated ability to design and deliver high-quality solutions, significantly improving system performance and scalability in previous roles at leading organizations like VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

experience.responsibilities:
Engineered backend services using **PHP** and **Symfony** to optimize document automation, user onboarding, and reporting workflows, achieving a **30%** increase in processing efficiency.
Developed event-driven solutions with **Node.js** and **Redis** for asynchronous processing of financial transaction requests, supporting **1000+** transactions per minute.
Deployed microservices on **Azure** App Services and utilized **Terraform** to manage infrastructure as code, ensuring seamless cloud operations and reducing deployment time by **40%**.
Created and maintained data pipelines for regulatory data exchange with **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, ensuring timely and accurate data flow with a data accuracy rate of **99.9%**.
Led security assessments and integrated **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for secure, scalable authentication systems, enhancing user data protection for over **5000** users.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to address system integration challenges, ensure compliance, and oversee release strategies using **CI/CD** practices and **GitHub Actions**.

• Developed backend systems in **Python** and **FastAPI** to automate document workflows and streamline user onboarding, showcasing expertise in software architecture and modernization patterns.
• Created event-driven microservices using **Celery** and **Redis**, enabling asynchronous processing of financial data and transaction requests, reflecting strong problem-solving and communication skills.
• Managed the deployment of microservices on **Azure App Services**, leveraging **Terraform** for infrastructure automation, ensuring consistent and scalable environments across **3** different applications.
• Engineered data pipelines for the secure exchange of regulatory data, utilizing **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions** to automate and streamline data flow, improving data migration processes by **40%**.
• Performed security audits, ensuring compliance with industry standards, and integrated **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** to manage authentication and secure access controls, enhancing system security by **50%**.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure smooth system integration, regulatory compliance, and successful release management, resulting in the timely delivery of projects within **4**  sprints.

- Developed backend services for trade execution, portfolio management, and account tracking using **Python**, **Flask**, and **PostgreSQL** to enhance trading operations.
- Collaborated closely with frontend teams to deliver data through **REST APIs** and **WebSocket** channels, ensuring smooth user interaction with the platform.
- Engineered real-time price feed processors with **asyncio**, **WebSockets**, and **Redis** to deliver up-to-the-minute trading data for high-frequency transactions.
- Introduced job queuing and scheduling solutions with **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, optimizing backend task execution and process management, achieving a **30%** increase in task processing speed.
- Implemented comprehensive test suites with **PyTest**, **tox**, and mock servers, streamlining QA and Continuous Integration (CI) processes for efficient development cycles, reducing bug rates by **25%**.
- Ensured the platform met regulatory requirements, including **MiFID II** and **GDPR**, while adhering to internal data security protocols, maintaining a compliance rate of **100%**.
- Experience with **GitHub Actions** for CI/CD pipelines, automating deployments and code reviews, and familiarity with cloud services like **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP** for scalable infrastructure solutions.
